conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for your continued interest in Nursery_E. We do keep an internal waitlist of families who have contacted us, and openings—if they occur—typically come from families accepting offers elsewhere or changes in their plans.

At this moment we are not able to confirm a place, but the best next step is to remain in touch and check back in upcoming rounds. If you would like, you may also submit an [APPLY] again in a later round to be reconsidered should availability arise.

If you can share your preferred start date (and whether you have flexibility within the next few weeks), that will help us contact you quickly if a place opens.

Kind regards,
Nursery_E Admissions

[TALK]

conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for checking in and for confirming your immediate availability.

At this point in the round, we still cannot confirm an opening at Nursery_E. Any availability would most likely come from last-minute changes (e.g., another family finalizing placement elsewhere), and we typically contact waitlisted families directly if a place becomes available.

To ensure you can be considered as quickly as possible, please continue to check in each round; if you have not heard from us and you would like to be actively reconsidered that round, you may also submit a formal [APPLY] message again.

Kind regards,
Nursery_E Admissions

conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for checking in and for confirming you remain ready to start on short notice.

At this time, we do not have a confirmed opening to offer this round. If an opening arises due to a last-minute change/decline, we will contact families on our internal waitlist directly. If you would like to be actively reconsidered in a given round (rather than only waiting for us to reach out), the best step is to submit a formal [APPLY] message that round.

To help us move quickly if a place becomes available, could you please confirm:
1) your child’s date of birth/age,
2) the schedule you need (full-time/part-time, days/hours), and
3) the best phone number/email for immediate contact.

Kind regards,
Nursery_E Admissions
